title: Does Riot promote toxicity?
body:
I'm really curious why a player I mute in game gets un-muted in the end game lobby. 
Does Riot want you to be toxic back at them because it's the end of the game and no longer effects it?
Do they want you to get verbally abused once again so you have to block them completely?
Really want to know a reds thought on this.

replies.body: You don't have to read it or even stay on the page, so no.

If you're sitting there honoring people or reporting them, it's still there.
Plus it makes people who rage stay in there longer being more toxic.
Instead of just clicking one button to block them in the lobby.. 
you have to manually type in their name, I just don't get it.

EDIT: Blocking them does not hide their post-game chat. It just blocks them from messaging you and giving you invites; it also automatically mutes them if you're ever in a game with them again. The reason for that is that you aren't required to read the post-game chat.
Riot has stated pre-game chat is reportable therefore I assume post-game would be too.

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?p=47334546#post47334546

I looked it up. They are reportable. It just doesn't seem like they're actually using the reports.
If that was the case they'd just let people say whatever they want all the time.... oh wait they pretty much do :P

I've gone 0-30 a few times. raged a lot of times. and trolled almost all the time. for a whole year now. people say they report me, and "have fun with your perma-ban", but nothing. nothing. why riot, nothing?

I had an urgot go 2-19 with teleport and revive and he's still around trolling games in ranked.
Had players tell me to kill myself along with racist comments and they're still around.
How the chat restrictions/bans work, I'm not so sure but what I am sure of is they're not working.

I just got my second one. I never swear at people, tell them to kill themselves, etc.  What I do is I want to ff. I yell at people for not ffing. The only insult I throw out is calling people morons for not ffing. I say the game is hopeless, that we lost. I basically spam it in a really upset voice every couple of minutes. I also got rank restricted. Ironic, considering I'm much better behaved in ranked.
